product_name: La Sportiva Xplorer Approach Shoes - Men's
long_description: The grippy, all-synthetic La Sportiva Xplorer Approach Shoes are designed to perform well on approach hikes as well as easier rock climbs and alpine climbs. All-synthetic upper eliminates stretch and repels water while keeping the weight down. Overwrap(TM) rand construction lets you comfortably stand on smaller edges. Vibram(R) X-Traction(R) outsole with Idro Grip compound combines lugs and edging platforms for walking and climbing performance. To-the-toe lacing allows you to easily adjust the fit for various end uses. Dual-density midsole provides excellent cushion for long days. The La Sportiva Xplorer Approach Shoes have highly compressed EVA RockGuards in the forefeet for protection on rough trails.
short_description: The grippy, all-synthetic La Sportiva Xplorer Approach Shoes are designed to perform well on approach hikes as well as easier rock climbs and alpine climbs.
